title: Italy’s Oscar Contender ‘Familia’ Takes a Genre-Bending Deep Dive Into Trauma and Abuse
summary: Director Francesco Costabile discusses his use of horror elements, working with the award-winning cast members, and why he wants to create "cinema that shapes your conscience and your emotions."

title: Firefly Aerospace shares jump 15% on strong revenues, boosted guidance
summary: Firefly Aerospace, which went public in August on the Nasdaq, issued better-than-expected third-quarter results and lifted its guidance.
